menu.ADMIN_VIEW:
Park+ Admin Menu!! Choose from the options below -
1) Check Parking Capacity
2) Add Vehicle Category
3) Update Parking Space
4) Update Parking Charges
5) Ban Slot
6) Unban Slot
7) View Ban Slots
8) Quit
menu.OPERATOR_VIEW:
Park+ Operator Menu!! Choose from the options below -
1) Check Parking Capacity
2) Add Vehicle
3) Assign Slot
4) Un-Assign Slot
5) Quit
menu.ADMIN_MENU_VIEW:
Welcome to Park+!! Choose from the options below -

1) Admin View
2) Operator 
3) Quit
menu.LOGIN_VIEW:
Hello Welcome to Park+!! Choose from the options below -
1) Login
2) Exit
